techmeme.title: Sources: Databricks is in advanced talks to acquire startup Neon, a maker of a serverless open-source alternative to AWS Aurora Postgres, for about $1B (Alex Konrad/Upstarts Media)
Palantir reports Q1 revenue up 39% YoY to $884M, vs. $863M est., and raises 2025 sales guidance to $3.9B on demand for AI software that's a "ravenous whirlwind" (Lizette Chapman/Bloomberg)
Nvidia launches open-source transcription model Parakeet-TDT-0.6B-V2, topping the Hugging Face Open ASR Leaderboard with a word error rate of 6.05% (Carl Franzen/VentureBeat)
TeleMessage's parent company says it is "investigating a potential security incident" and has suspended all of its services "out of an abundance of caution" (Kevin Breuninger/CNBC)
Sources: General Atlantic is in advanced talks to buy a minority stake in Blackstone-backed Liftoff; the deal would value the mobile app marketing firm at $4B+ (Bloomberg)
